about_the_game: One year after the events of the Spring Castle, you and Shinji are still together. You two seem to both be growing and changing and yet...there are still so many questions unanswered. Finally, you turn to the only one who may be able to help answer them. But even if you know the answer, will you be able to grasp the truth?
detailed_description: One year after the events of the Spring Castle, you and Shinji are still together. You two seem to both be growing and changing and yet...there are still so many questions unanswered. Finally, you turn to the only one who may be able to help answer them. But even if you know the answer, will you be able to grasp the truth?
legal_notice:
• Gameplay videos need to have prior permission to be uploaded outside of Steam. Doing so without permission means your video might be at risk to be taken down. Email us at support@aeondreamstudios.com to request prior permission.
  • Screenshots are welcomed and encouraged, but please avoid showing any major plot moments.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: One year after the events of the Spring Castle, you and Shinji are still together. You two seem to both be growing and changing and yet...there are still so many questions unanswered. Finally, you turn to the only one who may be able to help answer them. But even if you know the answer, will you be able to grasp the truth?
